title: What skills do you need to be a grant writer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ability to be project leader with the grant writing team, make assignments, hold people accountable Ability to follow instructions and write to the specific questions Heightened listening skills and strong reading skills Write with passion, illustration, clarity and conciseness Analyze and verify budget numbers, understand the financials Ability to synthesize the multiple ‘voices’ into one unified voice Self-Esteem to relinquish ownership of authorship Ability to plan and hit deadlines earlier than on-time
